item.title: Life Rising Corporation Recalls Chinese Herbal Supplements Because of Possible Health Risk
item.description: Life Rising Corporation of Willowbrook, IL is recalling Life Rising Holder-W Holder Warmer capsules, Life Rising NECK-ND Neck Clear capsules, and HoliCare Metabolism Cleansing (MET-CLS) tablets because the products have the potential to contain excessive levels of lead.
item.dc:creator: FDA

item.title: Sagent Pharmaceuticals Issues Voluntary Nationwide Recall of Ketorolac Tromethamine Injection, USP, 60mg/2mL (30mg per mL) Due to Lack of Sterility Assurance
item.description: Sagent Pharmaceuticals, Inc. today announced the voluntary nationwide recall of one lot of Ketorolac Tromethamine Injection, USP, 60mg/2mL (30mg per mL). This product was manufactured by Zydus (Cadila Healthcare Limited) and distributed by Sagent Pharmaceuticals, Inc. Sagent has initiated this volun
item.dc:creator: FDA

item.title: GMJ Natural Products, Inc. Issues Allergy Alert on Undeclared Whey Protein in "Jugo Moringa Plus Antioxidant 32 Fl Oz Jug"
item.description: GMJ Natural Products Inc. of Anaheim, Ca, is recalling its 32 fl oz jugs of Jugo Moringa Plus Antioxidant because they may contain undeclared whey protein. People who have allergies to milk or soy lecithin run the risk of serious or life-threatening allergic reaction if they consume these products.
item.dc:creator: FDA

item.title: Ferrara Candy Issues Allergy Alert on Undeclared Peanuts and Wheat in Almond Supremes with a Best by Date of 4/22/2017
item.description: Ferrara Candy Company has initiated a voluntary recall of Brach’s® 5 ounce Almond Supremes with a best by date of 4/22/2017 after discovering that some Brach’s® Almond Supremes packages may include Brach’s® Bridge Mix, a product that contains peanuts and wheat.
item.dc:creator: FDA

item.title: Biohealth Nutrition Announces the Recall of Precision Blend Cookies and Cream Product for Undeclared Allergen
item.description: Precision Blend Time Release Protein Cookies and Cream
item.dc:creator: FDA

item.title: Lipari Foods Issues Voluntary Recall of Various Bulk and Retail Cheese Products Due to Possible Health Risk
item.description: Lipari Foods, LLC has issued a voluntary recall of various bulk and retail cheeses manufactured by Deutsch Kase Haus due to potential contamination of Listeria monocytogenes.
item.dc:creator: FDA

item.title: Grande Produce Issues Voluntary Recall of Limited Quantity of Papaya “Caribeña” Due to Potential Health Risk
item.description: Salmonella is an organism that can cause serious and sometimes fatal infections in young children, frail or elderly people, and others with weakened immune systems. Healthy persons infected with salmonella often experience fever, diarrhea, nausea, vomiting and abdominal pain.
item.dc:creator: FDA

item.title: Jurox Incorporated is Voluntarily Recalling Two Lots of Alfaxan Unpreserved, an Intravenous Injectable Anaesthetic
item.description:
This recall has been initiated due to an out of specification result for clarity observed in the stability program.
The presence of the aluminum phosphate precipitate presents a potential risk that intravascular (I.V.) injection of product containing this precipitate could result in blood vessel in
item.dc:creator: FDA

item.title: Pfizer Inc. Issues A Voluntary Nationwide Consumer Level Recall of One Lot of ThermaCare® Back Pain Therapy HeatWraps, up to 16HR pain relief, Due To Out of Specification Results for High Cell Temperature
item.description: Pfizer Consumer Healthcare, a division of Pfizer Inc., is voluntarily recalling one lot of ThermaCare® Back Pain Therapy HeatWraps, up to 16HR pain relief, to the consumer level.
item.dc:creator: FDA

item.title: Caito Foods, LLC Voluntarily Recalls Fresh Cut Melon Product Because of Possible Health Risk
item.description: aito Foods is voluntarily recalling fresh cut watermelon, fresh cut honeydew melon, fresh cut cantaloupe and fresh cut mixed fruit containing one of these melons, produced at the Caito Foods facility in Indianapolis because these products have the potential to be contaminated with Salmonella
item.dc:creator: FDA

item.title: Updated: Torrent Pharmaceuticals Limited Issues Voluntary Nationwide Recall of Losartan Potassium Tablets, USP and Losartan Potassium /Hydrochlorothiazide Tablets, USP
item.description: Torrent Pharmaceuticals Limited is voluntarily recalling 60 lots of Losartan potassium tablets USP and 54 lots of Losartan potassium/ hydrochlorothiazide tablets, USP, to the consumer level due to the detection of trace amounts of an unexpected impurity found in an active pharmaceutical ingredient (
item.dc:creator: FDA

item.title: Allergen Alert Expansion: Kitchen Cravings Strawberry and Mixed Berry Parfaits with Trace Peanuts or Almonds
item.description: Kwik Trip, Inc. located in La Crosse, WI has expanded their recall of Kitchen Cravings Strawberry and Mixed Berry Parfaits in an 8.25 oz. cup because they may contain undeclared traces of peanuts or almonds
item.dc:creator: FDA

item.title: Bee International issues Allergy Alert on Undeclared Milk in “Plastic Heart Tubes with Chocolate Lentils”
item.description: Bee International, Inc. of Chula Vista, CA is recalling its 1.7oz. Plastic Heart Tubes with Chocolate Lentils because they may contain undeclared milk protein
item.dc:creator: FDA

item.title: Beyond Better Foods, LLC Issues Allergy Alert on Undeclared Peanuts in Mislabeled Ice Cream
item.description: Beyond Better Foods, LLC is recalling select cases from a single production run of Enlightened brand Peanut Butter Chocolate Chip ice cream because they may have been packaged in Mint Chocolate Chip ice cream containers and thus contain undeclared peanuts
item.dc:creator: FDA

item.title: Licata Enterprises Asks For Volunary Recall of Multiple Vitamin Because of A Possible Fish Allergen Health Risk
item.description: Licata Enterprieses of Huntington Beach, California is recalling its The Supreme One / Theravits 100 multiple vitamin (all lots) due to the discovery of a confusing labeling issue which could cause cause individuals allergic to fish oils to ingest the product in error.
item.dc:creator: FDA

item.title: Chlorofields Recalls Asian MIicrogreens Because Of Possible Health Risk
item.description:
ChloroFields of Lawrence, KS is recalling 20 cases of Asian Microgreens,because they have potential to be contaminated with Salmonella, an organism which can cause serious and sometimes fatal infections in young children, frail or elderly people, and others with weakened
immune systems.
item.dc:creator: FDA

item.title: New Nan Fong Hong Trading Inc. Issues Allergy Alert on Undeclared Sulfites in Source Day Natural Treasures Dried Liquorice Slice
item.description: New Nan Fong Hong Trading Inc. is recalling its 16 oz (454g) packages of Source Day Natural Treasures Dried Liquorice Slice because they contain undeclared sulfites
item.dc:creator: FDA

item.title: Alebrije Dist Wholesale Recalls Quesillo Queseria “La Milagrosa” and “Alebrije Cheese” Because of Possible Health Risk
item.description: ALEBRIJE DIST WHOLESALE is collaborating with health ofﬁcials due to a positive ﬁnding of Salmonella in a sample of Quesillo “Queseria La Milagrosa”. ALEBRIJE DIST WHOLESALE is voluntarily recalling the amount of 100 kilos of Quesillo “Queseria La Milagrosa”. While “Alebrije Cheese” has not been fou
item.dc:creator: FDA

item.title: ConAgra Foods Expands Recall of P.F. Chang’s Home Menu Brand Meals Available in Grocery Retailers Due to Potential Presence of Foreign Material ConAgra Foods Does Not Make Meals for P.F. Chang’s Restaurants
item.description: ConAgra Foods is expanding a voluntary recall of P.F. Chang’s Home Menu Brand products due to the potential presence of small metal fragments (2-9mm) in the sugar used in the sauce. This voluntary action is being undertaken because of impacted sugar from a supplier.
item.dc:creator: FDA

item.title: Recall of Bittersweet & Feve Chocolate Bars Due to High Levels of Milk Allergens
item.description: Today, Recchiuti Confections (San Francisco, CA) discovered two batches of their Bittersweet Chocolate Bar and two batches of their Feve Chocolate Bar contain high levels of milk protein after FDA sampling. No illnesses have been reported to date. People who have an allergy or severe sensitivity to
item.dc:creator: FDA
